test_message: User always takes Western line over Harbour line even when both options are equal. What preference should be learned?

recent_patterns.description: User consistently chooses Western line even when Harbour line presents an equivalent or equally optimal route.

recommendations_for_other_agents.transport_agent: Prioritize Western line options when presenting travel routes, even when other lines offer similar efficiency.
recommendations_for_other_agents.schedule_agent: Assume consistent travel durations based on Western line schedules.
recommendations_for_other_agents.wellness_agent: No direct route implication; continue monitoring for stress or rest issues during commutes.
